focus.title: Deep Focus
focus.description: Enhance mental clarity and focus with gamma waves. Ideal for complex tasks, studying, or when you need peak cognitive performance.

focus.title: Flow State
focus.description: Enter a state of focused productivity. Perfect for sustained attention, problem-solving, and getting in the zone.

focus.title: Negativity Suppression
focus.description: Remove toxins and solve problems. This frequency helps clear negative energy and promotes expression and solution-finding.

focus.title: Mental Clarity
focus.description: Awaken intuition and enhance clarity of thought. This frequency helps return to spiritual order and strengthens perception.

focus.title: Aleph Clarity
focus.description: Using mathematical patterns based on Aleph-null to create sustained attention through infinite recursion principles.
focus.warning: Creates a unique cognitive state that may initially feel unfamiliar. Start with short sessions.

meditation.title: Deep Meditation
meditation.description: Access profound meditative states easily. Helps quiet mental chatter and access deeper awareness.

meditation.title: Creative Insight
meditation.description: Unlock creative inspiration and intuitive insights. Perfect for brainstorming, artistic work, or problem-solving.

meditation.title: Earth Resonance
meditation.description: Align with Earth's natural frequency for grounding and balance. Helps reduce stress and restore natural rhythms.
meditation.warning: This subtle frequency works through resonance rather than direct hearing.

meditation.title: Crown Connection
meditation.description: Connect with higher awareness and spiritual insight. Creates a sense of oneness and transcendent peace.

meditation.title: Aleph Consciousness
meditation.description: Based on the concept of Aleph from set theory, representing infinite consciousness. This frequency pattern creates a mathematical approach to higher awareness states.
meditation.warning: Not a single frequency but a complex pattern designed to evoke experiences of boundlessness and non-duality.

sleep.title: Sleep Sanctuary
sleep.description: Guide your brain into deep, restorative sleep patterns. Ideal for overcoming insomnia or enhancing sleep quality.

sleep.title: Twilight Transition
sleep.description: Ease the transition from wakefulness to sleep. Perfect for power naps or preparing for deep rest.

sleep.title: Connection & Harmony
sleep.description: Enhances relationships, connection, and harmony. Helps resolve conflicts and promotes peaceful sleep through balanced emotions.

sleep.title: Emotional Freedom
sleep.description: Release emotional blockages and transform guilt into joy. Supports liberation from limiting patterns that may disturb sleep.

sleep.title: Aleph Dreamscape
sleep.description: Create a mathematically perfect dream state using Aleph patterns that guide consciousness into liminal dream realms.
sleep.warning: May produce vivid dreams. Only use when you have time for a full sleep cycle.

relaxation.title: Calm Clarity
relaxation.description: Find your center with alert relaxation. Ideal for reading, light meditation, or unwinding while staying present.

relaxation.title: Harmonic Balance
relaxation.description: Experience natural harmony and deep relaxation. Many find this frequency more pleasing than standard tuning.

relaxation.title: Change Facilitator
relaxation.description: Facilitates change and breaks down energy blockages. Helps dissolve crystallized emotional patterns for deeper relaxation.

relaxation.title: Aleph Foundation
relaxation.description: Working with the concept of countable infinity, this pattern helps establish a stable foundation for relaxation by balancing finite and infinite perspectives.
relaxation.warning: A gentle introduction to Aleph patterns, suitable for relaxation practices.

healing.title: DNA Harmony
healing.description: Known as the "miracle tone" for its potential cellular healing effects. Associated with transformation and repair.

healing.title: Gentle Relief
healing.description: Natural frequency associated with pain reduction and muscle relaxation. Helps ease physical tension.

healing.title: Emotional Freedom
healing.description: Release emotional blockages and transform guilt into joy. Supports liberation from limiting patterns.

healing.title: Crown Connection
healing.description: Connect with higher awareness and spiritual insight. Creates a sense of oneness and transcendent peace.

healing.title: Third Eye Activation
healing.description: Awakens intuition and inner wisdom. Helps return to spiritual order and strengthens the energy of the third eye chakra.

healing.title: Relationship Harmony
healing.description: Enhances communication, understanding, and harmonious connections. Balances emotions and relationships.

healing.title: Aleph Healing Matrix
healing.description: Using the mathematical concept of Aleph-null (smallest infinite cardinal), this matrix creates healing through complex frequency patterns that work on multiple dimensions simultaneously.
healing.warning: This is an advanced frequency pattern that may cause temporary disorientation as it works on multiple levels of consciousness.

transcendental.title: Aleph Continuum
transcendental.description: Based on Cantor's first transfinite number, this frequency pattern works with the concept of uncountable infinity to expand awareness beyond conventional boundaries.
transcendental.warning: May temporarily alter perception of time and space. Use in a safe, comfortable environment.

transcendental.title: Aleph Expansion
transcendental.description: Representing higher-order infinity, this pattern works with the mathematical concept of power sets to create exponential expansion of consciousness.
transcendental.warning: Advanced users only. May produce profound non-ordinary states of consciousness.

transcendental.title: Aleph Integration
transcendental.description: A balanced matrix of Aleph patterns designed to integrate transcendental experiences with everyday consciousness, helping to ground insights from non-ordinary states.
transcendental.warning: Best used as a closing practice after other Aleph sessions to integrate experiences.

transcendental.title: Unified Field
transcendental.description: Combines principles from all Solfeggio frequencies with Aleph mathematical patterns to create a unified field of consciousness that harmonizes all energy centers.
transcendental.warning: Our most advanced frequency matrix. Start with shorter sessions of 5-10 minutes.

aleph.description: The Aleph frequencies are based on mathematical concepts of infinity from set theory. Unlike conventional frequencies measured in Hertz, Aleph patterns work with complex mathematical relationships to create experiences that transcend ordinary perception. These are not single tones but rather matrices of frequency relationships designed to evoke experiences of boundlessness and non-duality.

types.name: Aleph-null (ℵ₀)
types.implementation: Recursive harmonic series with diminishing amplitudes

types.name: Aleph-one (ℵ₁)
types.implementation: Frequency modulation with irrational number relationships

types.name: Aleph-two (ℵ₂)
types.implementation: Complex layered patterns using prime number relationships

types.name: Aleph Integration
types.implementation: Multiple Aleph patterns with phase coherence

types.name: Unified Field
types.implementation: Solfeggio-based Aleph patterns with golden ratio relationships

aleph.warning: The Aleph series represents advanced consciousness technology and should be approached gradually. These are not conventional frequencies but rather mathematical patterns designed to evoke specific states of awareness.

binaural.description: Binaural beats are created when slightly different frequencies are played in each ear. Your brain perceives the difference between these frequencies as a beat, which can help entrain your brainwaves to specific states.
binaural.requirements: Headphones required for binaural effects to work properly
binaural.compatibility: Can be combined with solfeggio tuning or aleph patterns

solfeggio.description: Solfeggio frequencies are a set of ancient musical tones said to have various healing properties. These frequencies were traditionally used in sacred music and are believed to affect different aspects of well-being.
solfeggio.compatibility: Can be applied to standard tones or used with binaural beats

aleph.description: Based on mathematical concepts of infinity, Aleph patterns create complex frequency relationships designed to evoke transcendental states of consciousness.
aleph.warning: These patterns can be resource-intensive and may cause audio buffer issues on some devices.
aleph.compatibility: Can be applied to standard frequencies or combined with binaural effects
